TopicTitle: [WIP][1.1.3] XKOM- Interceptors Update- The Raven Takes Flight

Articles.Content:

We've been featured in a YouTube series by TheBeardyPenguin:

News:

The XKOM Project has now been activated on YouTube by TheBeardyPenguin (the Skyranger will make its debut next episode):

[COMING SOON]

The Raven Interceptor! A first-class, hyperagile STOL dogfighter.

Finally the Raven Interceptor lives

 

 

Edited June 26, 2016 by SpannerMonkey(smce)
Cant seem to get it to VTOL properly

9 minutes ago, Cdodders said:

Cant seem to get it to VTOL properly

Hi ideally you would set it up with action groups,  to use the VTOL to its best you need to shut off the main thrust engines (fwd of course) Also the position of  the wings has a large effect on VTOL use, there are iirc 3 position nodes for mounting the wings,  for VTOL use  the aft. most rearward of the positions functions most effectively, the position of the wings dramatically changes the balance of the craft, and while the most forward position is a good all around place, it does limit it's VTOL abilities, either way, the other team member's stuffed a load of sas torque in there so you should be ok to for slow fwd/aft hover no ,matter in which position the wings are mounted

Edited August 20, 2016 by SpannerMonkey(smce)
typo

Hey everyone, I'm back! 

So some advice on the VTOL: there's a great mod called Throttle Controlled Avionics-- it's wonderful for struggling VTOL pilots (i.e. me). 

Also, the Interceptors Update (Part 1- the Raven Interceptor) is coming soon-- we're working on the (RPM-supported) IVA. IU part 2 will be the Firestorm Interceptor, and IU part 3 will be weapons.

Update: Interceptors Update Part 1: Operation Symphony Eagle, is now released!

http://spacedock.info/mod/529/XKOM

Edited September 23, 2016 by rafat abubreak
SpaceDock's download for XKOM seems to no longer be bugged! Yaay!

Hey guys, I just wanted to thx you for this wonderful mod, I love the ship, and for me it works sooo perfectly, for what I had been doing. 

I decided to modify the ship to use it as a VTOL-Cargo ship, in where I attach a winch to the middle of its center of weight and then any of my kerbals can grab it and attach it to the connector on the ship or piece of equipment that I want to move. 

The thing is that the current configuration of the skyranger, only support around 21 tn of mass. That's the capacity of the current motors, to lift up the entire ship in VTOL mode, but if it weighs more than that it a little bit hard to keep the ship in control without using the controlled throttle mod. I did manage to attach 2 more motors and it gave me that necessary twr, to lift anything to a maximum capacity of 22 tons, this is using the mod that enhance the VTOL mode, but it really doesn't looks as pretty as it did without other motors attached. I would like to know if it's possible for you guys to come up with an Idea to have like a cargo version with extra thrust or a little bit more power to do some heavy lifting. 

I will add a video version of the skyranger with the parts that I added and how I had been using it to move submarines and to move equipment and stuff to the abandoned island in where I'm creating a mini colony, with the USI kolonization stuff.

-----Needed to add this!!!----- After working on this for a couple of more hours I finally got it set. I just added 2 more panthers inside the VTOL Wings, they match the bottom exhaust intake perfectly. Now If I want to do a cargo of something I just need to toggle afterburners, for that extra load. Would be nice to have something like an overdrive or afterburner for the vtol wings. 

 

Edited November 3, 2016 by WarriorneX

Hi sorry took so long to get you a reply nimskr is busy with real life and I'm buried in mods,  i saw the first bit then the edit and was going to say we could probably do a dual mode cfg like the panthers for the vtols,   But really I'd like to do SR again from scratch there's a number of things that bug me and i wouldn't do it that way again, i have different methods for dealing with complex shapes, no less time consuming but much better in the end.  Should time allow I'll have a look at the engine mods etc, things have been so mad with 1.1.3.2.1.2 etc  that i didn't even have a copy left on my machine, i still have the raw models but i need to find out where we left off ,:)  ( but really i want to test the raven against the latest bda top gun competitors to see if it's as good as i thought it was)

Cheers
